titles.title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to require manufacture, sale, or import of a minimum number of motor vehicles that met certain standards for drunk and impaired driving prevention, and for other purposes.

To amend title 49, United States Code, to require manufacture, sale, or import of a minimum number of motor vehicles that met certain standards for drunk and impaired driving prevention, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
